image.caption: Image courtesy of the Honorable Frank M. Kratovil, Jr.

profileText: A Representative from Maryland; born in Lanham, Prince George's County, Md.; May 29, 1968; B. A., Western Maryland College, Westminster, Md., 1990; J. D., University of Baltimore School of Law, Baltimore, Md., 1994; law clerk; assistant state's attorney, Prince George's County, Md., 1994-1997; assistant state's attorney, Queen Anne's County, Md., 1997-2001; state's attorney, Queen Anne's County, Md., 2003-2008; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eleventh Congress (January 3, 2009-January 3, 2011); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Twelfth Congress in 2010.
